document.full_text: gameloft sa , a french video game publisher, sees its growth coming from the just-launched amazon appstore and from games played on televisions without consoles, the top executive told reuters.
document.title: gameloft looks to app stores, tv for growth: ceo
lines_and_colors: gameloft sa , a french video game publisher, sees its growth coming from the just-launched amazon appstore and from games played on televisions without consoles, the top executive told reuters.
